talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Observation_02>I would have never dreamed we'd find
traces of the Zonai down here in this
forgotten place.
talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Description_03>Zonai... The very word has an air
of mystery.

The Zonai civilization comes up again and
again in history books, but none really
tells us much about who they were.
talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Beware_02>One thing historians have been sure
about is that the Zonai existed during a
time of great significance...
When Hyrule itself was founded.
talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Guess>I wonder what more we'll discover as we
go farther.
talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Description_03>I...<sp:5:0:0>don't like the look of this. But we
must find our answers, Link.
talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Surprise_03>That green light in the distance...


I'm having the strangest sensation.
This is all so ominous...
talk_07:
<snd:Observation_00>These are ruins from an ancient
civilization.

Wait...<sp:5:0:0> Something is written here.


Might these ruins be...<sp:5:0:0>from the Zonai?
talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Observation_00>Given that Zonai ruins are right here,
under the castle... Hm...

It's strong evidence that the books are
correct—the Zonai and Hyrule shared
some sort of history together.
talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Surprise_03>I can't tell you how excited I am.


The murals down here—their images
support so much of what historians
have written about.
talk_09:
<snd:Observation_01>These carvings...


I'm sure they're Zonai in origin. I've seen
designs like this in my studies.

The Zonai are said to have lived long ago,
in the time of earliest legend.

They possessed godlike powers and had
a prosperous civilization in the sky.

<snd:Description_03>Many history books tell us about the
Zonai, but none gives us the full picture.
Much is still unknown about them.
talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Observation_01>I find myself wondering...how did this
area come to be so forgotten? Why was
our history left hidden here?
Did the royal family in those ancient
times want this place and these murals
to remain secret and out of sight?
talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Guess_00>I can't shake the feeling that I'm missing
something here.

Why would anyone want to keep this
whole area a secret? It can't be because
of what's shown in those murals...
talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Guess_00>I never imagined this was all deep
beneath Hyrule Castle...
talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Observation_00>I can only hope we'll find more answers
farther below.
talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When I was a child, I asked my father if
there was anything below the castle.

He told me there was, though seeing
it for ourselves or even discussing the
matter was forbidden.
No one in our family knew anything more
than that.
talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Description_02>The gloom is growing heavier as we go.
It's more and more unnerving...
talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Description_03>I can recall what my father said, even
now. "No one must ever venture beneath
the castle—not even one of us."
He said this warning had been passed
down through my family for as long as
anyone could remember.
talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>We need to continue to explore this
underground area, forbidden or not.

The source of the gloom is down
here somewhere.
talk_11:
<snd:Observation_00>Is this what the Zonai looked like?
They seem so different than us, and
such large ears...
How did the ruins from a civilization in the
sky end up here beneath the castle?

It looks like the path ahead goes even
deeper. Let's continue, Link.
talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Observation_00>I am determined to discover the
connection between this place and
the emergence of the gloom.
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's keep on going. We're sure to find
some clues to all of this ahead.
talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Guess_00>The ruins we're seeing down here...


I'm certain this all must be from the
Zonai civilization.
